answerText: Versos Sencillos [or Simple Verses][10] This poet wrote Versos Sencillos and suggested that his countrymen should resist Europeanization in the prose "Our America."
heading: Penn Bowl |2013 | 6 | 17 | Literature | World | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: This collection includes a poem in which the narrator has "a white rose to tend" that he gives "to the true friend" and has another "for the cruel one." [10] Name this poetry collection that begins with the line, "A sincere man am I." A few of its poems were adapted into a patriotic song.
